headline: Simon Acquires Brickell City Centre Retail in Miami
summary: The center has an upscale array of retail, entertainment and dining components and some innovative architectural features.

raw.headline: Simon Acquires Brickell City Centre Retail in Miami

headline: Swire sells majority stake in Brickell City Centre retail to Simon for $512M
summary: Swire Properties’ Henry Bott, Simon Property Group’s David Simon and Saks Fifth Avenue at Brickell City Centre (Swire Properties, Google Maps, Getty)Swire Properties cashed out of the retail and parking components of Brickell City Centre in a $512 million deal with Simon Property Group. Simon, an Indianapolis-based shopping center-focused real estate firm led by David Simon, bought Swire’s majority 75 […]This article originally appeared on The Real Deal. Click here to read the full story.

headline: Simon Acquires Swire Properties' Interest in the Open-Air Shopping Center At Brickell City Centre
summary: Simon and Swire Properties, Inc. announced that Simon has acquired Swire Properties' interest in the retail and parking at Brickell City Centre. Brickell City Centre is a mixed-use property that has...

headline: Miami's Brickell City Centre sold to Simon Property in up to $548.7 million deal
summary: Simon Property already owned a 25% stake in the retail component since 2025 and has now bought the remaining.  Swire said in a statement proceeds from the deal would be used for the funding requirements of the group's U.S. arm and general working capital requirements.  Brickell City Centre stretches across four floors and features more than 90 retail stores, anchored by Saks Fifth Avenue.

headline: Simon® Acquires Swire Properties' Interest in the Open-Air Shopping Center at Brickell City Centre
summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, and Swire Properties, Inc., a leading developer of mixed-use, commercial, and residential properties in Miami, today announced that Simon has acquired Swire Properties' interest in the retail and parking at Brickell City Centre.
